traits.name: Assassinate
entries: During its first turn, Urstul has advantage on attack rolls against any creature that hasn't taken a turn. Any hit Urstul scores against a {@quickref Surprise|PHB|3|0|surprised} creature is a critical hit.

traits.name: Evasion
entries: If Urstul is subjected to an effect that allows him to make a Dexterity saving throw to take only half damage, Urstul instead takes no damage if he succeeds on the saving throw, and only half damage if it fails.

traits.name: Sneak Attack (1/Turn)
entries: Urstul deals an extra 14 ({@dice 4d6}) damage when he hits a target with a weapon attack and has advantage on the attack roll, or when the target is within 5 feet of an ally of Urstul that isn't {@condition incapacitated} and Urstul doesn't have disadvantage on the attack roll.

actions.name: Shortsword
entries: Melee atk +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 6 (1d6 + 3 damage) piercing damage, and the target must make a DC 15 Constitution saving throw, taking 24 (7d6 damage) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

actions.name: Light Crossbow
entries: Ranged atk +6 to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. 7 (1d8 + 3 damage) piercing damage, and the target must make a DC 15 Constitution saving throw, taking 24 (7d6 damage) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
